ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with this course compared to others you have taken was:
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
How would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other F&ES courses you have taken?
Given the course objectives, the level of intellectual challenge of the material covered was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learned a bit about building construction and really enjoyed the hands on experiences of learning to use various tools
This course was really cool and a very positive learning environment. I had no experience in this field, so everything was new.
I learned the basics of buildings operations and specifically water and heat transfers/movements in buildings.

narratives.question_text: How well did the knowledge, skills, and insights gained in this class align with your expectations?
comments: Again, I had no experience in anything relating to buildings and I learned a lot. It's also very clearly stated in the syllabus what will be learned. The most interesting component is the optional trip to the Green Build Conference.

I thought the class would be more focused on green buildings versus "old" inefficient building designs. I think it seemed more like a class for engineers than environmental students who plan to manage efficient buildings.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of the course and how could it be improved?
comments: I think that this course is pretty solidly what it is - an experiential one credit class. I don't think it needs changing.

narratives.question_text: What advice would you give to a student considering taking this class?
comments: Take this as you can. It's not a lot of work for a big reward and new knowledge. Moreover, the instructor is great and waaaaay better than most FES profs. in that he creates a very relaxed but effective learning environment
